Regulation Name(s): Nucleic acid-based device for the amplification, detection, and identification of microbial pathogens directly from whole blood specimens
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for T2Candida 1.1 Panel using T2 Magnetic Resonance to detect five Candida species directly from human whole blood with updated cartridge design and workflow.
Indications for Use Summary: For the presumptive diagnosis of candidemia by direct qualitative detection and identification of five Candida species from EDTA human whole blood in patients with symptoms or risk for invasive fungal infection; performed independently of blood culture, requires concomitant cultures for susceptibility testing.
